events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your site, but it doesn't fit me at all. I would like to return it and get a full refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund based on customer's request to return and get money back for purchased jacket.
Support agent Linda has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! I'm Linda from customer support, and I’m here to help you with the jacket return and refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason why the jacket did not fit? This will help us process your refund faster.
The order number is 2456789. The jacket is much smaller than described in the size chart, and it’s too tight around the shoulders.
Thank you for the details. You can send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly. Once we receive the item, we’ll issue a full refund within 5 business days.
That sounds good, thank you! I will print the label and ship the jacket back today.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and everything is settled to your satisfaction.
Since you confirmed receipt of your refund, we are closing this case. Please contact us if you need any further assistance.
